headline: Moody’s, MSCI to Offer Private-Credit Risk Assessments
summary: The collaborators aim to provide default probability assessments for investors based on factors such as borrower leverage and profitability.

headline: Moody's (NYSE:MCO) Partners With MSCI For Innovative Private Credit Risk Assessment Solution
summary: Moody's (NYSE:MCO) recently announced a joint initiative with MSCI to develop an innovative solution for assessing risks in private credit investments. This collaboration leverages MSCI's vast data repository and Moody's EDF-X models, providing enhanced risk insights and tools for investors. Despite this positive development, Moody's shares declined 2.93% last week, aligning closely with broader market pressures, where major indexes including the Dow Jones and S&P 500 also saw significant...

headline: MSCI and Moody's to Launch Independent Risk Assessments for Private Credit Investments
summary: NEW YORK, April 21, 2025--MSCI Inc. (NYSE:MSCI) and Moody’s Corporation (NYSE:MCO) will jointly create a first-of-its-kind solution to provide independent risk assessments for private credit investments at scale.
